name: player career year basic display
description: Test case for basic career year column display
expected_query: select "player"."pid", player.fname, player.lname, t209f3a217d72274fbedbe4d44e4a5095.career_year as career_year_0, "player"."pos" from "player" inner join "player_seasonlogs" as "t94ac00224f565e211ce527fca507baed" on "t94ac00224f565e211ce527fca507baed"."pid" = "player"."pid" and t94ac00224f565e211ce527fca507baed.seas_type = 'REG' and t94ac00224f565e211ce527fca507baed.year = ${constants.current_season.stats_season_year} left join "player_seasonlogs" as "t209f3a217d72274fbedbe4d44e4a5095" on "t209f3a217d72274fbedbe4d44e4a5095"."pid" = "player"."pid" and t209f3a217d72274fbedbe4d44e4a5095.seas_type = 'REG' and t209f3a217d72274fbedbe4d44e4a5095.year = 2023 where t94ac00224f565e211ce527fca507baed.career_year >= '1' group by player.fname, player.lname, t209f3a217d72274fbedbe4d44e4a5095.career_year, "player"."pid", "player"."lname", "player"."fname", "player"."pos" order by 4 ASC NULLS LAST, "player"."pid" asc limit 10
